Upcoming Events

3.22.19 // 10am–3pm

Grand Opening

Friday Studio’s official first day. Come for the free coffee and stay to work among your friends and other students. Michael McDermott, who teaches in the Graphic Design department, will be in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help.

AB 1020

Open Studio

General open studio hours. Michael McDermott, who teaches in the Graphic Design department, will be in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help. Free coffee while it lasts.

4.26.19 // 10am–10pm

Open Studio: Late Night

Late night open studio hours for the final week of class. Michael McDermott, who teaches in the Graphic Design department, will be in the room to offer critique, technical advice, and general help. Free coffee for the early group, pizza when the sun sets.
